Water + Wind = Wave
Earth + Wave = Sand
Fire + Sand = Glass
Sand + Water = Beach
Earth + Glass = Bottle
Beach + Bottle = Message
Beach + Fire = Sun
Earth + Message = Letter
Sun + Wind = Sunflower
Letter + Sunflower = A
Bottle + Sunflower = Oil
c + o = u
n + o = t
L + i = n  // 16



Gen 1 - 61 Elements -> 61 Total Elements
Gen 2 - 227 Elements -> 288 Total Elements
Gen 3 - 796 Elements -> 1084 Total Elements
Gen 4 - 2500 Elements -> 3584 Total Elements
Gen 5 - 8348 Elements -> 11932 Total Elements
Gen 6 - 0 Elements -> 11932 Total Elements
